price: “Ani akeekkachiisaadha; Rabbii tokkicha injifataa ta’e malee dhugaan gabbaramaan hin jiru” jedhi.
arabic: قُلۡ إِنَّمَآ أَنَا۠ مُنذِرٞۖ وَمَا مِنۡ إِلَٰهٍ إِلَّا ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡوَٰحِدُ ٱلۡقَهَّارُ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: qul innamā anā mundhirun wamā min ilāhin illā al-lahu al-wāḥidu al-qahāru
